item.title: Premium Yoga Mat
item.description:
Premium Yoga Mat

Enhance your yoga practice with our premium, eco-friendly yoga mat designed for comfort and stability.

Features

  • Non-slip surface
  • Extra thick cushioning (6mm)
  • Eco-friendly materials
  • Lightweight and portable
  • Easy to clean

Specifications

  • Dimensions: 183cm x 61cm x 6mm
  • Material: TPE (Thermoplastic Elastomer)
  • Weight: 1.2kg
  • Colors: Blue, Purple, Green, Pink
  • Care: Wipe clean with damp cloth
  • Suitable for all yoga levels

item.title: Smart LED Lamp
item.description:
Smart LED Lamp

Illuminate your space with our intelligent LED lamp that combines style, functionality, and smart technology.

Features

  • Voice control compatible
  • Adjustable brightness and color temperature
  • Timer and scheduling functions
  • Energy efficient LED technology
  • Modern minimalist design

Specifications

  • Power: 10W LED
  • Color temperature: 2700K-6500K
  • Brightness: 10-100% dimmable
  • Connectivity: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth
  • Lifespan: 25,000 hours
  • Control: Voice commands, mobile app

item.title: UltraBook Pro
item.description:
UltraBook Pro

Power through your workday with our premium ultrabook designed for professionals who demand the best.

Features

  • 14-inch 4K display
  • Intel Core i7 processor
  • 16GB RAM
  • 512GB SSD storage
  • Backlit keyboard
  • All-day battery life

Specifications

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12th Gen
  • RAM: 16GB DDR5
  • Storage: 512GB NVMe SSD
  • Display: 14-inch 4K touchscreen
  • Graphics: Integrated Iris Xe
  • Weight: 2.8 lbs
  • Battery: Up to 12 hours

item.title: Designer Jacket
item.description:
Designer Jacket

Stay stylish and comfortable with our premium designer jacket, perfect for any season and occasion.

Features

  • Water-resistant fabric
  • Breathable lining
  • Multiple pockets
  • Adjustable cuffs and hem
  • Premium zipper

Materials & Care

  • Outer: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton
  • Lining: 100% Polyester
  • Machine washable
  • Available in sizes S-XXL

item.title: Smartphone Pro Max
item.description:
Smartphone Pro Max

Experience the future of mobile technology with our flagship smartphone featuring cutting-edge performance and stunning design.

Features

  • 6.7-inch OLED display
  • 5G connectivity
  • Triple camera system
  • All-day battery life
  • Water and dust resistant

Specifications

  • Processor: Latest Snapdragon chip
  • RAM: 12GB
  • Storage: 256GB
  • Camera: 108MP main, 12MP ultra-wide, 12MP telephoto
  • Battery: 5000mAh
